name: 高得畬
objective:
==============================================
課程大綱：  307618
==============================================
* Introduction 
      -Moore’s rule
      -Cost and TW's IC design 
* Production
      -Mask, Ingot/Wafer
      -Processing
      -Cross-section , latch up
      -Layout, Reverse Engineering
      -Electro-Migration & RC
      -CMP & Design Rules
* Gate Level Design
      -Logic Gates, Noise Margin
      -Power, Fan-out and loading
      -Timing of Logic Networks
* Logic Networks
      -Simulation, Cross Talk
      -Test Patent Generation & DFT
* Introduction to Fin-FET
schedule:
==============================================
課程進度：
==============================================
week /date/topics
01. 09/16/22 Chapter 1 Introduction (Moore’s rule)
02. 09/23/22 Chapter 1 Introduction (Cost and TW)
03. 09/30/22 Chapter 2 (Mask)
04. 10/07/22 Chapter 2 (Processing)
05. 10/14/22 Chapter 2 (Transistors)
06. 10/21/22 Quiz 1, Chapter 2 (Cross-section , latch up)
07. 10/28/22 Chapter 2 (Layout, Reverse. Engineering)
08. 11/04/22 Midterm Examination 
09. 11/11/22 Review; Chapter 2 (Electro-Migration & RC)
10. 11/18/22 Chapter 2 (CMP & Design Rule & RC)
11. 11/25/22 Chapter 3 (Logic Gates, Noise Margin)
12. 12/02/22 Chapter 3 (Power, Fan-out and loading)
13. 12/09/22 Chapter 3 (Timing of Logic Networks)
14. 12/16/22 Chapter 4 (T-Sim, Cross Talk)
15. 12/23/22 Quiz 2, Chapter 4 (Test Patent Generation & DFT)
16. 12/30/23 5 (Memory types, Set-up & hold time)
17. 01/06/23 Final Examination
18. 01/13/23 Exam review and Fin-FET
